title: Sven Rieger
text: I am a postdoctoral researcher in educational research at the University of Tübingen in Germany.

title: Sven Rieger
text:
Interests
My research interests encompass:

causal inference
R programming paired with Quarto
latent variable modeling with a focus on longitudinal analyses
(motivation & personality development)

title: Sven Rieger
text:
